[[עַרְשׂוֹתָם]] Am 6:4; —couch, divan, Am 3:12, Am 6:4 (‖[[מִטּוֹת]]), + 2Sa 17:28 (rd. [[עַרְשׂת מִשְׁכָּב]] Klo Ne:Marg. 18 HPS, cf. LXX); for lying at night Job 7:13, Ps 6:7 (‖[[מִטָּה]]), Pr 7:16, [[עֶרֶשׂ יְחוּעָָי]] Ps 132:3 the coach of (consisting in) my bed; couch of sickness Ps 41:4; marriage couch Ct So 1:16; perhaps transf. to sarcophagus, as last couch [[עַרְשׂוֹ עֶרֶשׂ בַּרְזֶל]] De 3:11 (v. Dr).
